metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6602 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: libutils in Android through 5.1.1 LMY48M allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via crafted metadata in a (1) MP3 or (2) MP4 file, asdemonstrated by an attack against use of libutils by libstagefright inAndroid 5.x.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
